documents.document: @kodaxx7 I'm very proud of local private sponsors who have done so much to sponsor refugee families - they deserve a tonne of credit! (2/2)
@kodaxx7 Canada will accept 25,000 refugees this year. To accept more, there must be adequate housing, lang/skills training, etc (1/2)
@Canesbian I unreservedly oppose the ban.
